name: charts_track
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Fetch a list of popular songs from a specified chart using the Shazam API.

listid.description: The identifier for the chart list, as returned by the `/charts/list` endpoint. Defaults to `None`.

pagesize.description: The number of items to fetch per response, with a maximum of 20. Defaults to `20`.

startfrom.description: The starting index for paging through the results. Defaults to `0`.

locale.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to `'en-US'`.
